introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.firstParagraph: We have as objective facilitate the development of systems with Angular and focusing on being used internally on the company of software development SMN, but it is also available for the public on its repository at GitHub and on the NPM package.
introduction.secondParagraph: This module contains components following the Material Design guidelines and other utilities (that are used internally and also available for being used externally).
introduction.thirdParagraph: On this website you can find the documentation and examples of the use of the components and utilities.
